Title: Authorizes the county of Suffolk and the village of Nissequogue, in the county of Suffolk, to offer the 20-year retirement option to Bridget Topping, a police officer employed by such county and village
Summary: Authorizes the county of Suffolk and the village of Nissequogue, in the county of Suffolk, to offer the 20-year retirement option to Bridget Topping, a police officer employed by such county and village.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize the county of Suffolk and the village of Nissequogue to offer an optional twenty-year retirement plan to police officer Bridget Topping
